summary: This document is an email exchange from August 2023 between the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York and an unidentified recipient regarding a factual question about a 'Leon Black Inquiry'. It shows ongoing communication about the inquiry.

persons.name: Leon Black
persons.context: He is the subject of an inquiry being discussed by the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Initial Inquiry Communication
events.description: An email was sent from the United States Attorney's Office regarding a factual question about the Leon Black Inquiry.

events.title: Follow-up Scheduling
events.description: A follow-up email was sent to schedule a chat about the Leon Black Inquiry for sometime after lunch.

keyFacts: The United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was actively discussing a 'Leon Black Inquiry' in August 2023.
The communication indicates a factual question needed to be resolved regarding the inquiry.
The emails show coordination to schedule a chat about the inquiry, suggesting ongoing investigative activity.
